title: Affiliations
content: I have heard that PSU recruitments read GOI /UPSC exams, there is a requirement for colleges to be AICTE affiliated for engineering courses. Is this true. Post us changing to a deemed university , are we still AICTE affiliated or just following AICTE norms.

comments.body: PES is an independent university so we don't need AICTE approval and also don't have one
Yes but it still does not help answer the basic question. Do we get an opportunity or? Do we have someone who had joined a PSU last year from our seniors?
Just search on LinkedIn I'm sure there are seniors who have joined PSUs
People from PES are joining government bodies, even in 2023. We are affiliated to UGC and this year onwards we are NAAC A+
